programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying Doug Liman - Director Tom Cruise - Major William Cage Emily Blunt - Rita Vrataski Bill Paxton - Master Sergeant Farell Brendan Gleeson - General Brigham Jonas Armstrong - Skinner Noah Taylor - Dr Carter Tony Way - Kimmel Kick Gurry - Griff Franz Drameh - Ford Dragomir Mrsic - Kuntz Charlotte Riley - Nance Terence Maynard - Cruel sergeant Lara Pulver - Karen Lord.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Spectacular Sci-Fi
programme.desc: Reach beyond the stars and discover new worlds as we take a spectacular journey through some of our favourite sci-fi movies, from Blade Runner to Star Trek V: The Final Frontier.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Period action romance starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh and Zhang Ziyi. China in the 19th century: having failed to avenge the murder of his master by the evil Jade Fox, martial arts expert Li Mu Bai renounces fighting for a life of meditation. But when his antique sword, Green Destiny, is stolen by Jen, a young aristocrat, Li and his fellow warrior Yu Shu Lien give chase Ang Lee - Director Chow Yun-Fat - Li Mu Bai Michelle Yeoh - Yu Shu Lien Zhang Ziyi - Jen Chang Chen - Lo Lung Sihung - Sir Te Cheng Pei Pei - Jade Fox Li Fa-Zeng - Governor Yu Gao Xian - Bo.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Jan 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.sub-title: Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective, Mystery ║ 2010 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Romantic sci-fi drama starring Emily Blunt and Matt Damon. A seemingly random series of events brings ambitious politician David Norris together with ballet dancer Elise Sellas, with whom he falls in love. But was their meeting down to chance, and are there now supernatural forces conspiring to keep them apart George Nolfi - Director Matt Damon - David Norris Emily Blunt - Elise Sellas Anthony Mackie - Harry Mitchell John Slattery - Richardson Terence Stamp - Thompson Michael Kelly (2) - Charlie Traynor Jennifer Ehle - Brooklyn Ice House bartender Anthony Ruivivar - McCrady.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba. Three years into its five-year mission, the USS Enterprise stops off at a remote outpost for maintenance and provisions. There the crew answer a distress call from a stranded ship, but they are attacked by an army of unknown aliens that overwhelms the Enterprise. n Justin Lin - Director Chris Pine - Captain James T Kirk Zachary Quinto - Commander Spock Karl Urban - Dr \Bones\ McCoy Zoë Saldana - Lieutenant Uhura Simon Pegg - Montgomery \Scotty\ Scott John Cho - Sulu Anton Yelchin - Chekov Idris Elba - Krall Sofia Boutella - Jaylah Joe Taslim - Manas Lydia Wilson - Kalara Deep Roy - Keenser Shohreh Aghdashloo - Commodore Paris Greg Grunberg - Commander Finnegan.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Christian Bale and Sam Worthington. In the future, after the nuclear network SkyNet has destroyed most of humanity, John Connor is leading the human resistance fightback. Their plight is complicated, however, by the arrival of the mysterious Marcus Wright, a stranger whose purpose is unclear Joseph McGinty Nichol - Director Christian Bale - John Connor Sam Worthington - Marcus Wright Anton Yelchin - Kyle Reese Moon Bloodgood - Blair Williams Bryce Dallas Howard - Kate Connor Helena Bonham Carter - Dr Serena Kogan Common - Barnes Jane Alexander - Virginia Michael Ironside - General Ashdown Jadagrace Berry - Star Roland Kickinger - T-800 Arnold Schwarzenegger - T-800 Linda Hamilton - Sarah Connor.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones and Alicia Vikander. Now living in self-imposed exile, former agent Jason Bourne is contacted by an old colleague and is soon drawn into an operation to expose CIA dirty tricks. And, as Bourne well knows, nothing is as it seems and no one can be trusted Paul Greengrass - Director Matt Damon - Jason Bourne Tommy Lee Jones - CIA Director Robert Dewey Alicia Vikander - Heather Lee Vincent Cassel - Asset Julia Stiles - Nicky Riz Ahmed - Aaron Kalloor Ato Essandoh - Craig Jeffers Scott Shepherd - Edwin Russell Bill Camp - Smith Vinzenz Kiefer - Christian Dassault.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Drama, Crime/detective, Sci Fi, Action, Thriller ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Futuristic action thriller from director Steven Spielberg, based on the Philip K Dick short story, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell and Samantha Morton. In the mid-21st century, John Anderton is in charge of the Justice Department's Precrime unit, an elite force that can predict offences and make arrests before the crimes are committed. But Anderton's life falls apart when he is labelled a future murderer and forced to go on the run to clear his name Steven Spielberg - Director Tom Cruise - Chief John Anderton Colin Farrell (2) - Danny Witwer Samantha Morton - Agatha Max von Sydow - Director Lamar Burgess Lois Smith - Dr Iris Hineman Peter Stormare - Dr Solomon Eddie Tim Blake Nelson - Gideon Steve Harris - Jad Kathryn Morris - Lara Clarke Mike Binder - Leo Crow Daniel London - Wally the caretaker Spencer Treat Clark - Sean, aged nine Neal McDonough - Fletcher Jessica Capshaw - Evanna Patrick Kilpatrick - Knott Jessica Harper - Anne Lively Ashley Crow - Sarah Marks Arye Gross - Howard Marks Jason Antoon - Rufus Riley Joel Gretsch - Donald Doobin Cameron Crowe - Bus passenger Cameron Diaz - Bus passenger.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Mystery ║ 2021 ║ 15
programme.desc: Thirty young men and women are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Problem Child
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Ritter. Seven-year-old Junior is an orphan who, through his fiendish behaviour, has become the "most returned" inmate of the Brutus Orphanage. Eventually, he is adopted by unsuspecting suburban couple Ben and Flo, but his behaviour remains inventively destructive Dennis Dugan - Director John Ritter - Ben Healy Jack Warden - \Big\ Ben Healy Sr Michael Oliver - Junior Gilbert Gottfried - Mr Peabody Amy Yasbeck - Flo Healy Michael Richards - Martin Beck Peter Jurasik - Roy Charlotte Akin - Lorraine.

programme.title: Hook
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Family ║ 1991 ║ U
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Dustin Hoffman, Robin Williams, Julia Roberts and Bob Hoskins. Workaholic lawyer Peter Banning and his family spend Christmas in London with an old relative, Granny Wendy. The adults arrive home one evening to find that the children have vanished and a note has been left by Captain James Hook. programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Robin Williams. In 1969, a young boy called Alan gets trapped in the strange jungle world of a magical board game he has unearthed on a building site. programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Comedy, inspired by the 1970s TV series, starring Shelley Long and Gary Cole. Los Angeles in 1995: the community is crumbling and the crime rate is spiralling out of control. In the middle of all this, the Brady bunch - mum, dad and six children - live a happy and idyllic existence, caught in a time warp of 1970s values. programme.title: It Is In Us All
programme.desc: While travelling from London to Ireland to inspect a house bequeathed to him by an aunt, Hamish Considine is involved in a head-on collision. Seventeen-year-old Evan escapes from the wreckage of the other car, but a passenger is killed. A strange bond forms between the two survivors, and Hamish agrees to keep a secret for Evan about the accident. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? Sam, a terminally ill cancer patient, and law student Eric are among those who have survived the initial assault - but how long can they remain alive when the faintest noise can be deadly Michael Sarnoski - Director Lupita Nyong'o - Sam Joseph Quinn - Eric Alex Wolff - Reuben Djimon Hounsou - Henri Eliane Umuhire - Zena.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt. After a shocking on-set accident, stuntman Colt Seavers is taking some time out from the movie game. But when the lead actor vanishes from a film being directed by his old flame Jody Moreno, Seavers is persuaded to help track down the missing star and finds himself drawn into a disturbing conspiracy David Leitch - Director Ryan Gosling - Colt Seavers Emily Blunt - Jody Moreno Aaron Johnson - Tom Ryder Hannah Waddingham - Gail Meyer Stephanie Hsu - Alma Milan Teresa Palmer - Iggy Starr Winston Duke - Dan Tucker.

programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: A family's holiday to a remote getaway takes a lethal turn when they discover the island they're on is inhabited by a serial killer. programme.title: Coup!
programme.desc: Satirical period comedy starring Peter Sarsgaard, Billy Magnussen and Sarah Gadon. In 1918, as the flu pandemic rages, the mysterious Floyd Monk arrives at the isolated estate of the Horton family, claiming to be their new chef. However, the man of the house - an ambitious journalist - soon grows suspicious of his new employee, who seems to be planting subversive ideas among his staff and charming his family Joseph Schuman - Director Austin Stark - Director Peter Sarsgaard - Floyd Monk Billy Magnussen - Jay Horton Sarah Gadon - Julie Horton Willa Dunn - Molly Horton Callum Vinson - Tom Horton Skye P Marshall - Ruth Tidwell Faran Tahir - Kaan Kristine Nielsen - Catherine McMurray Fisher Stevens - Upton Sinclair.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.title: PL Greatest:Liverpool/Barnsley '97
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Barnsley, the 1-0 win over Liverpool at Anfield in November 1997.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Liverpool/Blackburn'95
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Blackburn Rovers, the 2-1 loss to Liverpool that saw Rovers clinch the title.

programme.title: PL Greatest: L'Pool/Blackpool 2010
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Blackpool, the 2-1 win at Anfield against Liverpool in October 2010.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/Bolton '01
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Bolton Wanderers, the 2-1 win over Man Utd at Old Trafford back in 2001.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 08/09
programme.desc: Relive some classic action from the Premier League archive.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Chelsea v Arsenal
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest goals from matches between London rivals Chelsea and Arsenal.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Peter Crouch
programme.desc: A celebration of the players to have bagged 100 goals or more in the Premier League. Here, a look at Peter Crouch, who has scored across a career at Liverpool, Spurs, Portsmouth and Stoke.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Bolton/Chelsea 2005
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 49 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Chelsea, the win over Bolton in 2005 that won the Blues their first title in 50 years.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Spurs/Arsenal'04
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal head to White Hart Lane back in 2004, looking to secure the Premier League title.

programme.title: PL Greatest:A Villa/B'Ham City '08
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Aston Villa enjoy a 5-1 win over Midlands rivals Birmingham at Villa Park back in 2008.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:M City/L'Pool 15
programme.desc: Relive a Premier League classic, as Man City face Liverpool back in November 2015. City needed a win to go back top of the table, while Liverpool were adapting to life under Jurgen Klopp.

programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Arsenal goalkeeper David Seaman.

programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest Premier League goals from past meetings between Manchester United and Everton.

programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best Premier League goals from past meetings between Newcastle United and Liverpool.
